nodes.text: Wevo, formally designated Moon Two-Three-One-Two-Three-Four, was a terrestrial moon in the Haileap system covered in wild jungle terrain which orbited the double gas giants Neralus and Nixus. Numerous creatures and vines could be found on the moon, and acid rain was a regular weather phenomenon. After a Nihil attack on the starship Steady Wing, a party consisting of Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh, Padawan Imri Cantaros, aspiring inventor Avon Starros, the Dalnan Honesty Weft and the droids J-6 and SD-7 was stranded on the moon after escaping the ship before its destruction. The young party later wound up in a confrontation on the moon with the pirates responsible for the Steady Wing's destruction, managing to capture them, before their eventual rescue.
